abstract: So far, Goldman Sachs has stayed on the sidelines as other Wall Street firms such as Citigroup, Credit Suisse and Deutsche Bank have jumped into the SPACs craze. That may be about to change.
lead_paragraph: So far, Goldman Sachs has stayed on the sidelines as other Wall Street firms such as Citigroup, Credit Suisse and Deutsche Bank have jumped into the SPACs craze. That may be about to change.
